body:
Spack fails to install argtable.

### Expected Result
argtable is installed

### Actual Result
Instalation fails

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install argtable
...
```

The output is in [spack.log](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/1776085/spack.log). It seems that the sourceforge link is somehow broken.

### Information on your system
I am using spack on macOS high Sierra
title: Download issue for argtable
